OB_HOST.description: Database host for connecting to the OceanBase server.
OB_HOST.title: OB_HOST

OB_PORT.description: Optional: Database port to connect to OceanBase, defaults to 2881 if not specified.
OB_PORT.title: OB_PORT

OB_USER.description: Username for authenticating with the OceanBase database.
OB_USER.title: OB_USER

OB_PASSWORD.description: Password for the specified database user.
OB_PASSWORD.title: OB_PASSWORD

OB_DATABASE.description: Name of the OceanBase database to connect to.
OB_DATABASE.title: OB_DATABASE
